# VoidNet Python : Python Library for Interacting with openvoidnet.com

VoidNet Python is the official Python library for the OpenVoidNet API, providing an Intelligence Development Kit (IDK) for developers to build intelligent applications.

## Features

- Command-line interface for quick greetings
- Modular API client structure for future expansions
- Easy-to-use Python library interface

## Installation

Install from PyPI:

```bash
pip install voidnet
```

Or install from source:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/openvoidnet/voidnet-python.git
cd voidnet-python
pip install -e .
```

## Usage

### Command Line

```bash
voidnet
```

### Python Library

```python
import voidnet

voidnet.greetings()
```

## API

The library currently provides a greeting function. Future versions will include full API client functionality for interacting with `api.openvoidnet.com`.
